Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma: 'We knew our bowlers had to take the lead'
USA captain Aaron Jones: 'I'm pleased to bring the game as close as we did'
Miscellaneous Highlights: India join Australia and South Africa in qualifying for the next stage
USA still have a chance to qualify, though, as they still have Ireland to play in their group
Others: India's Suryakumar Yadav hits an unbeaten 50
Virat Kohli scores a golden duck
